summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the AWS Resource Groups Tagging API across a wide range of services using the Moto library to mock AWS. It includes helper utilities for response assertions, directory creation, and role name retrieval, and defines numerous test cases that exercise resource discovery, tag key/value extraction, and tagging operations for services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, SageMaker, and others.
business_intent: To verify that the Resource Groups Tagging API correctly lists resources, retrieves tag keys and values, and applies tags across different AWS services, ensuring reliable tagging functionality within the application and preventing regressions.
